p: New thymol derivatives 53 and 54 ( Figure 12) were isolated from the roots of Eupatorium chinense L. and tested in vitro for their cytotoxic activities against three cancer cell lines CNE 2, Caski, and HGC-27. The considerable cytotoxic effects against the three cancer cell lines of compound 53 were observed with the IC 50 values ranging from 4.2 to 11.9 Î¼M [ 45].
